data.title: Charles Thomas Mansfield
data.text:
Birth - Marriage - Death - Burial

(Child) Birth*16 November 1931Â Charles Thomas Mansfield was born on 16 November 1931 at Perquimans County, North Carolina, USA.1Â Marriage*7 July 1956Â He, at age 24 years, 7 months and 21 days married Ruth Jeannette Boyce at age 22 years, 11 months and 3 days, daughter of William Oscar Boyce and Anna May Lane, on 7 July 1956 at Tyner, Chowan County, North Carolina, USA.. They were married by Reverend L. C. Chandler The Witness was Murray Lane Goodwin, Jacob Cameron Boyce and Thomas Obrey Asbell.2

Â Death*22 March 2024Â Charles Thomas Mansfield died on 22 March 2024 at home at Tyner, Chowan County, North Carolina, USA , at age 92 years, 4 months and 6 days.

Â Funeral Service30 March 2024Â He was Funeral Service on 30 March 2024 at Great Hope Baptist Church, Hertford, Perquimans County, North Carolina, USA .Â Burial*30 March 2024Â He was buried on 30 March 2024 at Bunch-Byrum-Dail-Boyce Family Cemetery, Tyner, Chowan County, North Carolina, USA .

Â

All Events in Chronological Order

(Child) Birth*16 November 1931Â Charles Thomas Mansfield was born on 16 November 1931 at Perquimans County, North Carolina, USA.1Â Marriage*7 July 1956Â He, at age 24 years, 7 months and 21 days married Ruth Jeannette Boyce at age 22 years, 11 months and 3 days, daughter of William Oscar Boyce and Anna May Lane, on 7 July 1956 at Tyner, Chowan County, North Carolina, USA.. They were married by Reverend L. C. Chandler The Witness was Murray Lane Goodwin, Jacob Cameron Boyce and Thomas Obrey Asbell.2

Â Birth of Son2 July 1957Â William Thomas Mansfield was born on 2 July 1957 at Chowan County, North Carolina, USA, at age 25.3Â Birth of Son6 July 1964Â Martin Boyce Mansfield was born on 6 July 1964 at Chowan Hospital, Edenton, Chowan County, North Carolina, USA , at age 32.4Â His Mother Died21 December 1975Â Margaret Elizabeth Barber died on 21 December 1975 at Pasquotank County, North Carolina, USA, at age 79 years, 4 months and 23 days.5Â Father of Groom18 June 1978Â William Thomas Mansfield age 20 years, 11 months and 16 days married Patricia Louise Perry age 20 years and 12 days, daughter of Carlton Nixon Perry and Alice Faye White, on 18 June 1978.Â His Father Died29 May 1988Â Freeman Noah Mansfield died on 29 May 1988 at Perquimans County, North Carolina, USA, at age 88 years and 23 days.6Â Nickname16 January 2006Â As of 16 January 2006, Charles Thomas Mansfield also went by the name of CT Mansfield.Â (Resident) Address*16 January 2006Â As of 16 January 2006, Charles Thomas Mansfield was living with Charles Thomas Mansfield and Ruth Jeannette Boyce at CT & Ruth Mansfield, Tyner, Chowan County, North Carolina, USA .

Â (Witness) Funeral Service28 December 2021Â CT Mansfield attended the Funeral Service of Louise J. Dail on 28 December 2021 at Miller Funeral Homes & Crematory, Hertford, Perquimans County, North Carolina, USA .Â DNA*28 December 2021Â CT Mansfield was DNA did an Ancestry DNA and ordered a Y-111 DNA test on 28 December 2021 at Miller Funeral Homes & Crematory, Hertford, Perquimans County, North Carolina, USA .
